name: Portal Puzzle
description:
Portal Puzzle combines the delightful simplicity of "Sugar, Sugar" with the ingenious mechanics of "Portal." Dive into a world where creativity meets physics in a sandbox of possibilities.



In Portal Puzzle, players navigate a series of levels where the objective is to get sand to the flag. Using portals and a variety of tools at your disposal, manipulate the flow of the sand to achieve your goal.



Every level introduces a fresh twist, captivating your mind and inspiring imaginative solutions. Deceptively simple in its design, with every challenge offering an elegant solution, Portal Puzzle is an invitation to think differently.

Music by Quint Hutchinson
